import React,{useState}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UsuarioDetalhes(_ref){let{usuarios,onEdit}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const usuario=usuarios.find(u=>u.id===parseInt(id));const[formData,setFormData]=useState(usuario);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value,type}=e.target;if(type==='file'){setFormData({...formData,[name]:e.target.files[0]});}else{// Impedir letras e permitir apenas números para o campo de data de nascimento
if(name==='dataNascimento'){// Permitir somente números e limitar a 4 caracteres
const formattedValue=value.replace(/\D/g,'').slice(0,4);setFormData({...formData,[name]:formattedValue});}else{setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});}}};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onEdit(formData);navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Editar Usu\xE1rio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Nome:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"nome",value:formData.nome,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"CPF:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"cpf",value:formData.cpf,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Data de Nascimento (Ano):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"dataNascimento",value:formData.dataNascimento,onChange:handleChange,required:true,maxLength:"4"// Garante que o input tenha no máximo 4 caracteres
,pattern:"\\d{4}"// Garante que o input seja composto de 4 dígitos
,placeholder:"Ano (ex: 1990)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Estado Civil:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"estadoCivil",value:formData.estadoCivil,onChange:handleChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"solteiro",children:"Solteiro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"casado",children:"Casado"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"viuvo",children:"Vi\xFAvo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"separado",children:"Separado"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Telefone:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"telefone",value:formData.telefone,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Anexar PDF:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",name:"arquivoPDF",accept:".pdf",onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Anexar TXT:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",name:"arquivoTXT",accept:".txt",onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Salvar Altera\xE7\xF5es"})]})]});}export default UsuarioDetalhes;
